class HMAC_DRBG: botan.rng.rng.RandomNumberGenerator;
HMAC_DRBG (SP800-90A)

this(MessageAuthenticationCode mac, RandomNumberGenerator prng);
Params:
MessageAuthenticationCode mac the underlying mac function (eg HMAC(SHA-512))
RandomNumberGenerator prng RNG used generating inputs (eg HMAC_RNG)
